mapper.select: select t.no, t.content, t.deadline, t.status, m.no as owner_no, m.name as owner_name, p.no as project_no, p.title as project_title from pms_task t inner join pms_member m on t.owner=m.no inner join pms_project p on t.project_no=p.no order by p.no desc, t.content asc

select t.no, t.content, t.deadline, t.status, m.no as owner_no, m.name as owner_name, p.no as project_no, p.title as project_title from pms_task t inner join pms_member m on t.owner=m.no inner join pms_project p on t.project_no=p.no where p.no = #{value} order by p.no desc, t.content asc

select t.no, t.content, t.deadline, t.status, m.no as owner_no, m.name as owner_name, p.no as project_no, p.title as project_title from pms_task t inner join pms_member m on t.owner=m.no inner join pms_project p on t.project_no=p.no where t.no = #{value}
mapper.update: update pms_task set content=#{content}, deadline=#{deadline}, owner=#{owner.no}, status=#{status}, project_no=#{projectNo} where no=#{no}
